scripts.build: yarn build:clean && yarn react-client:build && yarn server:build
scripts.install: concurrently "cd server && yarn install" "cd react-client && yarn install"
scripts.server:build: cd server && yarn build && cpy **/*.* --cwd=dist ../../dist --parents && cpy ./package.production.json ../../dist/ --parents
scripts.watch: concurrently "cd server && yarn watch:serve" "cd react-client && yarn start"
